page.title: 04HORSFORTH POLICE STATION
page.content: Our Community Policeman for Horsforth showed us round the police station. There are over 100 officers working there on three shifts. We looked round the station and at some of the transport used. They have 3 Panda cars, 3 Patrol cars and 3 motor bikes. There are also C.I.D. cars for use by the Criminal Investigation Department. Patrol cars are used at the scene of an accident. The boot contains a lamp, a slow sign, a first aid kit, a fire extinguisher, a torch, a tape measure and a bullet proof clip board. The officer also carries a breatherliser and a personal radio. Communications are very important to the police and cars are in contact with the station where they have computer links to their Bradford H.Q. and other sources of information.
